info.title: NMKR Studio Api (Mainnet)
info.description: Documentation of the NMKR Studio Api Functions. All API Functions must called from https://studio-api.nmkr.io

get.summary: Adds a payout wallet to your account
get.description: With this call you can add a payout wallet in your account. You have to confirm the wallet by clicking the link in the email

200.description: Returns the Apiresultclass with the information about the address

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)

406.description: Some data are not correct - eg wrong wallet address

404.description: The project was not found in our database or not assiged to your account

get.summary: Blocks/Unblocks an nft  (nft uid)
get.description: You can block an nft, if it is not already sold or reserved and you can unblock blocked nfts

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)

406.description: Not Acceptable

get.summary: Cancels a address reservation (project uid)
get.description: When you call this API, the reservation of all nfts dedicated to this address will released to free state. This function can be called, when a user closes his browser or when he hit on a "Cancel Reservation" Button

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)

406.description: Address is not in active state - eg. already paid or already released to free

get.summary: Checks an address for state changes (project uid)
get.description:
You can call this api to check if a user has paid to this particular address or if the address has expired. The reserved/sold NFTs will only filled after the amount was fully paid. This is for security reasons. In the reserved state, only the nft ids and tokenamount are submitted 
            
IMPORTANT:
This function uses an internal cache. All results will be cached for 10 seconds. You do not need to call this function more than once in 10 seconds, because the results will be the same.

200.description: Returns the Apiresultclass with the information about the address incl. the assigned NFTs

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)

404.description: The address was not found in our database or not assiged to this project

get.summary: Checks an custom property for state changes (project uid)
get.description:
You can call this api to check if a user has paid to a particular address with a custom property or if the address has expired. The reserved/sold NFTs will only filled after the amount was fully paid. This is for security reasons. In the reserved state, only the nft ids and tokenamount are submitted 
            
IMPORTANT:
This function uses an internal cache. All results will be cached for 10 seconds. You do not need to call this function more than once in 10 seconds, because the results will be the same.

200.description: Returns the Apiresultclass with the information about the address incl. the assigned NFTs

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)

404.description: The custom property was not found in our database or not assiged to this project

get.summary: Creates a burning endpoint for a specific address
get.description:
When you call this endpoint, a Burning Address is created for this project. All NFTs associated with this project (same policyid) that are sent to this endpoint will be deleted (burned). All other NFTs will be sent back. 
The policy of the project must still be active.If it is already locked, it can no longer be deleted.

200.description: The burning address was created successfully

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectuid etc.)

406.description: Some parameters where not correct or the project already has 10 or more burning addresses

500.description: Internal server error - see the errormessage in the result

get.summary: Returns detail information about nfts with a specific state with Pagination support. (project uid)
get.description:
You will receive all information (fingerprint, ipfshash, etc.) about the nfts within a specific state.
State "all" lists all available nft in this project. The other states are: "free", "reserved", "sold" and "error"

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: (Optional) The sort order of the result. Possible values are: id (default),id_desc (descending order), selldate (on sold nfts) and selldate_desc (descending order)

200.description: Returns a List of the NFT Class

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)

406.description: The projectuid was not found

get.summary: Returns an address for a random nft sale (project id)
get.description:
When you call this API, you will receive an address where the buyer has to pay the amount of ada you define. The address will be monitored until it expired. The count of nft will be reserved until it expires or the buyer has send the ada to this address.
If the buyer has send the amount of ada, the nfts will be minted and send to his senderaddress and the nfts state changes to sold.

IMPORTANT:
Please notice, that the call is limited to 300 address reservations per minute. You will get the error 429 if you call this routine more than 300 times a minute.
Please do not implement this function on your start page. And please prevent the call of this function from bots with a captcha.

parameters.name: referer
parameters.description: (Optional) A referer code

parameters.name: customproperty
parameters.description: (Optional) A custom property which can be set. Will be returned at webhooks or checkaddress

parameters.name: optionalreceiveraddress
parameters.description: (Optional) You can specify a different receiver of the nft

parameters.name: optionalpriceintokenpolicyid
parameters.description: (Optional) You can specify an additional price in tokens (policyid)

parameters.name: optionalpriceintokenassetnameinhex
parameters.description: (Optional) You can specify an additional price in tokens (tokenname in hex)

parameters.name: optionalpriceintokencount
parameters.description: (Optional) You can specify an additional price in tokens (count)

parameters.name: optionalrefundaddress
parameters.description: (Optional) If there was refund because of minting error or saleconditions you can specify the receiver of the ada/sol

parameters.name: acceptheigheramounts
parameters.description: (Optional) The address accepts the correct or a higher amount for minting. If false or null the exact amount must be received

parameters.name: revervationtimeinminutes
parameters.description: (Optional) The time in minutes the address will be reserved

parameters.name: addresstype
parameters.description: The Base Addresses are with Stakekeys, the Enterprise Addresses without - only available in the cardano network

parameters.name: blockchain
parameters.description: The blockchain where the address should be created

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)

406.description: The demanded ada amount is too less. The minimium is 5 ADA - eg 5000000 lovelace

500.description: Internal server error - see the errormessage in the result

get.summary: Returns an address for a random nft sale (price from pricelist) (project id)
get.description:
When you call this API, you will receive an address where the buyer has to pay the amount of ada you define. The address will be monitored until it exipred. The count of nft will be reserved until it expires or the buyer has send the ada to this address.
If the buyer has send the amount of ada, the nfts will be minted and send to his senderaddress and the nfts state changes to sold.

Please do not implement this function on your start page. And please prevent the call of this function from bots with a captcha.

When you call this API, you will receive an address where the buyer has to pay the amount of ada you define. The address will be monitored until it exipred. The count of nft will be reserved until it expires or the buyer has send the ada to this address.
If the buyer has send the amount of ada, the nfts will be minted and send to his senderaddress and the nfts state changes to sold.
            
IMPORTANT:
Please notice, that the call is limited to 300 addressreservations per minute. You will get the error 429 if you call this routine more than 300 times a minute.
Please do not implement this function on your start page. And please prevent the call of this function from bots with a captcha.

parameters.name: customproperty

parameters.description: (Optional) You can specify a different receiver of the nft

parameters.name: optionalpriceintokenpolicyid
parameters.description: (Optional) You can specify an additional price in tokens (policyid)

parameters.name: optionalpriceintokenassetnameinhex
parameters.description: (Optional) You can specify an additional price in tokens (tokenname in hex)

parameters.name: optionalpriceintokencount

parameters.name: addresstype

get.summary: Mints random Nfts and sends it to an Address
get.description: When you call this API, random NFTs will be selected, minted and send to an ada address. You will need ADA in your Account for the transaction and minting costs.

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectuid etc.)

409.description: There are pending transactions on the sender address (your account address). Please wait a second

402.description: Too less ADA in your account. Fill up ADA first before try to mint and send

406.description: The receiveraddress is not a valid cardano address or a valid ada handle

500.description: Internal server error - see the errormessage in the result

post.summary: Upload a File to a project and pin it to IPFS
post.description:
With this API you can upload a file to IPFS and add it to a project. You can upload the file as BASE64 Content or as URL Link or as IPFS Hash.
If you submit Metadata, this Metadata will be used instead of the Metadatatemplate from the project. You can either submit Metadata or MetadataPlaceholder, but not both (because it makes no sense).
The Metadata field is optional and if you dont use it, it will use the Template from your project. It is poosible to mix both versions in one project. You can have one nft with own metadata and other nfts
with the template.

401.description: The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)

406.description: See the errormessage in the resultset for further information

409.description: There is a conflict with the provided images. Send a file either as Base64 or as Link or IPFS Hash

500.description: Internal server error - see the errormessage in the resultset

404.description: No Image Content was provided. Send a file either as Base64 or as Link or IPFS Hash

post.summary: Upload a File pin it to IPFS
post.description: With this API you can upload a file to IPFS. You can upload the file as BASE64 Content or as URL Link.

406.description: See the errormessage in the resultset for further information

500.description: Internal server error - see the errormessage in the resultset

404.description: No Image Content was provided. Send a file either as Base64 or as Link or IPFS Hash

409.description: There is a conflict with the provided images. Send a file either as Base64 or as Link or IPFS Hash
